name: coding-fonts
description: Some kind of visual look at coding fonts

scripts.screenshots: npm run screenshots:js && npm run screenshots:html && npm run screenshots:css && npm run screenshots:charmap
scripts.screenshots:js: node take_screenshots.js --lang js --theme light --font "$FONT" && node take_screenshots.js --lang js --theme dark --font "$FONT"
scripts.screenshots:html: node take_screenshots.js --lang html --theme light --font "$FONT" && node take_screenshots.js --lang html --theme dark --font "$FONT"
scripts.screenshots:css: node take_screenshots.js --lang css --theme light --font "$FONT" && node take_screenshots.js --lang css --theme dark --font "$FONT"
scripts.screenshots:charmap: node take_screenshots.js --lang charmap --theme light --font "$FONT" && node take_screenshots.js --lang charmap --theme dark --font "$FONT"
